quotes.quote: There was nothing like a Saturday - unless it was the Saturday leading up to the last week of school and into summer vacation. That of course was all the Saturdays of your life rolled into one big shiny ball.

It's not that we spend five days looking forward to just two. It's that most people do what they enjoy most on those two days. Imagine living a life where everyday are your Saturdays and Sundays. Make everyday your weekend. Make everyday a play-day
I told myself that I was going to live the rest of my life as if it were Saturday.
Love me like Saturday night, like three glasses of champagne, like the room is spinning, like you're drunk on my love.
Saturday night is perfect for writers because other people have 'plans.'
When you are unemployed, weekends are seven days long.
Different cocktails for different Saturday nights.
Saturday mornings, I’ve learned, are a great opportunity for kids to sneak into your bed, fall back asleep, and kick you in the face.

Saturday is the mightiest day of the week. It's unshakably, overwhelmingly superior. Not only is it a day off of school, the following day is also a day off, like some kind of Super Saiyan bargain sale.
Sunday would be lost without Saturday, and I would be lost without you.
Saturday is what gives us a weekend of enjoyment.
Without Saturday, Sunday would just be another day of the week.
Come on, no one works Saturday night!
Does anybody remember when Saturday night meant date night?
Ah. I love these lazy Saturdays. Ah. I love these real Saturdays. They're so relaxing.
Worth all your roses and snow / Is the blaze of light on a Saturday night / When the barrows are set in a row.
And you haven't a penny to spend / But you dream that you've pounds and pounds / And arm in arm with your only friend / You make your Saturday rounds.
In the market of Clare, so cheery the glare / Of the shops and the booths of the tradespeople there / That I take a delight on a Saturday night / In walking that way and in viewing the sight.
I saw you wholly to my mind / On Saturday - even one who shrined / All that was best of womankind.

I wish I could sleep / But I'm tied down / Dirty in these borrowed sheets / It's been a week / And I've singing to my feet, yeah / But I won't admit defeat 'til / Saturday, Saturday, Saturday / Well, come my way
Stone cold sober in the broad daylight / Downtown dancing on Saturday night / Thinking about you makes me feel all right / It's the way that you love me the way that you love me
Missed the Saturday dance / Heard they crowded the floor / Couldn't bear it without you / Don't get around much anymore
My Saturday was going pretty well until I realized it was Sunday!
On this Saturday, remember that you are the master of your fate and the captain of your soul.
Its Saturday I plan on doing nothing and plenty of it.
Today is Saturday, which means that the only decision that you should be making is whether to have a bottle or a glass of wine.
No wedding Saturday within the month of June / But what it is, is something true / Made up of these three words that I must say to you / I just called to say I love you
Saturday night is when you want to do what you want to do and not what you have to do.
Saturday night happens to be when most people take part in whatever is the current entertainment trend.
Saturday is still the busiest shopping day of the week, but the opening of stores on Sundays has made it less distinctively busy.
Saturday night still does have a distinct personality and effect on most people. People still act differently on a Saturday night for no reason other than it's Saturday night.
To me, it always seemed as though Saturday night was the down-home night.
I suppose any policeman who's been in Harlem for a month of Saturday nights has had all the experiences he'll ever need, as far as handling violence goes.
Saturday night is a time to try new things. Maybe that's why so many people in the older generation had to lose their lives on Saturday night.
Saturday night is the night for daring deeds.
Earlier this century Saturday was 'bath night'. Wash day. Bed sheets got changed.
In the postwar years, in quick time, Saturday became the cornerstone of a new social pattern.
Saturdays are a chance to wake up extra early and enjoy the freedom to do whatever I want.
Saturdays are an escape from school, work, and 'have to' tasks.
I think having more Saturdays sounds great, and having every day be Saturday sound even better.
Sleeping in on a Saturday always feels like a little bit of heaven.
There were many reasons to regard Saturday as the second best day after Friday.
I look forward to packing in the activities to live life to the fullest. To me, Saturdays are invaluable.
